body_html:
It maybe caused by directory: the master branch of bazel make a __main__ folder under the bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles, thus many files cannot be found.

temporary solution: you can recursively copy all the file generated out of __main__ folder, then run bazel-bin/...
body_text:
It maybe caused by directory: the master branch of bazel make a __main__ folder under the bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles, thus many files cannot be found.
temporary solution: you can recursively copy all the file generated out of __main__ folder, then run bazel-bin/...
body:
It maybe caused by directory: the master branch of bazel make a `__main__` folder under the `bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles`, thus many files cannot be found. 

**temporary solution:** you can recursively copy all the file generated out of `__main__` folder, then run `bazel-bin/...`
